result_list.explanation: La porte se rouvre. (The door reopens.) This is a general action that doesn't fit other categories.
Il tire un Papier. (He pulls a Paper.) This describes a character's interaction with an object.

Le Prince est assis avec le Marquis d'Alfons devant une table chargée de plans, de livres et de papiers, dont ils paraissent s'occuper, on entend un tumulte qui annonce une fête publique. (The Prince is seated with the Marquis d'Alfons in front of a table loaded with plans, books, and papers, of which they seem to be occupied, one hears a tumult that announces a public festival.) This is a long stage direction with a narrative quality.
